  • Method Details

    • addInterest

      public void addInterest(InterestAddDto interestAddDto, @Context jakarta.ws.rs.core.SecurityContext securityContext) throws DuplicatedAttributeException
      Adds an interest to the authenticated user, ensuring the interest exists.
      Parameters:
      interestAddDto - the DTO containing the interest information
      securityContext - the security context to retrieve the authenticated user
      Throws:
      DuplicatedAttributeException - if the user already has the interest or if the interest already has the user

    • getInterests

      public List<InterestGetDto> getInterests()
      Retrieves all interests from the database and converts them to DTOs.
      Returns:
      a list of InterestGetDto objects representing all interests

    • getInterestsByUser

      public List<InterestGetDto> getInterestsByUser(String username)
      Retrieves interests associated with a specific user by their username.
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the user whose interests are to be retrieved
      Returns:
      a list of InterestGetDto objects representing the user's interests

    • getInterestsByFirstLetter

      public List<InterestGetDto> getInterestsByFirstLetter(String firstLetter)
      Retrieves interests that start with the specified first letter.
      Parameters:
      firstLetter - the first letter to filter interests by
      Returns:
      a list of InterestGetDto objects representing the interests that start with the specified letter

    • getEnumListInterestTypes

      public List<InterestTypeEnum> getEnumListInterestTypes()
      Retrieves a list of all interest types defined in the InterestTypeEnum.
      Returns:
      a list of InterestTypeEnum values representing all interest types

    • removeInterest

      public void removeInterest(InterestRemoveDto interestRemoveDto, @Context jakarta.ws.rs.core.SecurityContext securityContext) throws UserNotFoundException, EntityNotFoundException
      Removes an interest from a user's list of interests.
      Parameters:
      interestRemoveDto - Data transfer object containing the interest to be removed.
      securityContext - Security context to retrieve the authenticated user.
      Throws:
      UserNotFoundException - if the authenticated user is not found.
      EntityNotFoundException - if the interest to be removed is not found.

    • convertInterestEntitytoInterestDto

      public InterestGetDto convertInterestEntitytoInterestDto(InterestEntity interestEntity)
      Converts an InterestEntity to an InterestGetDto.
      Parameters:
      interestEntity - The entity to be converted.
      Returns:
      The corresponding InterestGetDto.

    • convertInterestEntityListToInterestDtoList

      public List<InterestGetDto> convertInterestEntityListToInterestDtoList(List<InterestEntity> interestEntities)
      Converts a list of InterestEntity objects to a list of InterestGetDto objects.
      Parameters:
      interestEntities - The list of InterestEntity objects to be converted.
      Returns:
      A list of InterestGetDto objects.
